page.title: 09HEALTH
page.content: A{health centre}is where a number of doctors run{surgeries}and{clinics}in one building for the convenience of patients. At{Balby Health Centre}about 11 000 people are on roll from Warmsworth to visit the 10 doctors and 7 nurses employed. Approximately 600 people visit the 4 surgeries weekly. It opens at 8.15 am and closes at 6.15 pm all week. People without appointments can be attended to in emergencies. Dental clinics, Chiropodists, clinics for pre-natal, new babies and post-natal are available. No special arrangements are available for regular check-ups. Doctors make house calls but only 8 doctors can operate at once. The centre opened in l974 and has continued without accidents. There are five fire exits in the building.
